title: ollama/ollama
summary: Get up and running with Llama 3.3, Mistral, Gemma 2, and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client for Ollama, enabling easy integration of local LLMs into Python apps.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Ollama, works in Node.js and browsers.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration for Ollama, allowing use of local models in LangChain chains and agents.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama with chat interface, model management, and RAG support.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java client library for Ollama, providing easy integration into Java applications.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Rust client for Ollama with async support and ergonomic API.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension bringing local LLM code completion via Ollama.

title: ollama-chat
summary: Simple React chat interface for Ollama with markdown and code highlighting.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Enhanced CLI for Ollama with conversation history and prompt templates.

title: ollama-telegram
summary: Telegram bot that interfaces with Ollama, enabling chat with local LLMs via Telegram.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Discord bot integration for Ollama, allowing users to chat with local models in Discord.

title: ollama-kotlin
summary: Kotlin SDK for Ollama with coroutines support and Android compatibility.

title: ollama-spring-boot-starter
summary: Spring Boot starter for Ollama, providing auto-configuration and health checks.

title: ollama-workflows
summary: GitHub Actions workflows for automating Ollama model testing and deployment.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU support.

title: ollama-django
summary: Django app integrating Ollama for chatbots and content generation.

title: ollama-fastapi
summary: FastAPI wrapper around Ollama with OpenAI-compatible endpoints.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: .NET client for Ollama with async/await and dependency injection support.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Retrieval-Augmented Generation pipeline using Ollama and Chroma/Qdrant vector stores.
